stimulusHtml: A particle moves along a line so that its velocity is given by v( t )=− t 3 +2 t 2 + 2 −t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG2bWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp cqGHsislcaWG0bWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaiodaaaGccqGHRaWkca aIYaGaamiDa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGOm a8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacqGHsislcaWG0baaaaaa@452A@ for t≥0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyyzImRaaGimaaaa@398F@ . For what values of t is the speed of the particle increasing?
